txt.en: 'Hail, [placeholder]! If you are seeking glory among the Dwarves of Thorin's Hall, we have need of more sturdy adventurers to aid us in our struggle against the accursed Dourhands. If you are interested, seek T贸rth outside of the Blue Stone Garrison.'
'I was wondering when Unnarr would send more adventurers. We have much to discuss.'
'Torth is outside of the Blue Stone Garrison barracks. Hurry along now!'
Guard-captain Unnarr has asked that you speak with T贸rth outside the Blue Stone Garrison.
T贸rth can be found outside the Blue Stone Garrison near the waterfall in Thorin's Hall.\n\nGuard-captain Unnarr has asked that you speak with T贸rth to aid in the fight against the Dourhands.
